title: Police College team crowned champions
content: Under the patronage and in the presence of Lieutenant General Ghanem bin Shaheen al-Ghanem, Chief of Staff of the Qatar Armed Forces, the Police College team was crowned champions of the 2018 Ramadan football championship for officers. The Police College team won the trophy by beating the Military Police team in the final in  a penalty shootout. A number of senior officers of the Armed Forces were also present at the awarding ceremony.
